steps.description: Capacity exceeded + grease assembly + upsize suggestion

assertions.name: detect_kitchen
assertions.actual: for the hotel kitchen exhaust ventilation system, a two-stage filtration system is required to protect the carbon filter from grease contamination. grease in kitchen environments will irreversibly coat the activated carbon pores, preventing effective odor and gas removal. the first stage is a gdp pl

steps.description: GDB hospital env block → GDMI pivot

assertions.name: detect_hospital
assertions.actual: the gdb filter housing is not suitable for hospital environments due to its bolted construction, which does not meet the required leakage class and hygiene standards. the gdmi modulfilterskåp is approved for env_hospital and offers a better solution. given the hygiene requirements for hospital suppl

steps.description: Marine corrosion block (FZ=C3 vs C5 required) → material upgrade
